texts: I tried to stop, but I was too late.
A stranger who broke his promise.
You didn't wake up like you thought you would.
I was hoping for a while myself, but the third sunset confirmed that you were really dead
The life you had brought to me withered before my eyes
I wish I had been home that night
The nights had never felt so long
Maybe it was the grief that made me careless
Maybe it made me want to get caught
